title: Best medical care to be ensured to injured children: Dr Nadeem
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 25 (APP): The children injured in the bus accident at Shahdara Picnic Point have been admitted to the Pakistan Institute of Medical Sciences (PIMS) and Federal Government Polyclinic (FGPC) hospital.
According to a spokesperson of the Ministry of Health, caretaker Federal Minister for Health, Dr. Nadeem Jan issued instructions to the management of PIMS and Polyclinic Hospital for proper care of accident victims.
Dr Nadeem Jan directed that the best medical facilities should be ensured to the injured children.
He said that the government is ensuring all the necessary measures for the treatment of children.
